entities.name: port keys
entities.description: Port keys are objects that can be anything, but are unobtrusive so Muggles don't pick them up.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Muggles are people who do not know about magic and would think port keys are litter.

entities.name: stoatshead hill
entities.description: Stoatshead Hill is a location where Harry and Mr. Weasley climb.

relationships.description: Port keys are not visible to Muggles.
